00013 Neuron::Neuron(int NewIndex, NeuronType * Type, bool Monitored, bool IsOutput){

00017 void Neuron::InitNeuron(int NewIndex, NeuronType * Type, bool Monitored, bool IsOutput){
00018         int nv;
00019         //neutype=&Net.neutypes[type];
00020         for(nv=0;nv<Type->GetStateVarsNumber();nv++)
00021                 statevars[nv+1]=Type->GetInitValueAt(nv);
00022         statevars[0]=0.0F;
00023         type=Type;
00024         lastupdate=0.0F; // must be 0.0
00025         predictionend=NOPREDICTION;
00026         predictedspike=NOPREDICTION;
00027         this->index = NewIndex;
00028         //outconind=0;
00029         //noutputs=0;
00030         //firstincon=NULL; // initial value needed by find_in_connections
00031         monitored=Monitored;
00032         this->isOutput = IsOutput;
00033 }
00034 
00035 void Neuron::InitNeuronPrediction(EventQueue * eventQueue){
00036         predictedspike=FiringPrediction();
00037         if(predictedspike != NOPREDICTION){
00038                 predictedspike+=lastupdate;
00039                 InternalSpike * spike = new InternalSpike();
00040                 spike->SetTime(predictedspike);
00041                 spike->SetSource(this);
00042                 eventQueue->InsertEvent(spike);
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void Neuron::NeuronUpdate(double ElapsedTime){
00047         int ivar,orderedvar;
00048         NeuronType *type;
00049         float vars[MAXSTATEVARS];
00050         type=this->type;
00051         this->statevars[0]=ElapsedTime;
00052         for(ivar=0;ivar<type->GetTimeDependentStateVarsNumber();ivar++){
00053                 orderedvar=type->GetStateVarAt(ivar);
00054                 vars[orderedvar]=type->TableAccess(type->GetStateVarTableAt(orderedvar), this->statevars);
00055         }
00056         for(ivar=0;ivar<type->GetTimeDependentStateVarsNumber();ivar++){
00057                 orderedvar=type->GetStateVarAt(ivar);
00058                 this->statevars[orderedvar+1]=vars[orderedvar];
00059         }
00060         for(ivar=type->GetTimeDependentStateVarsNumber();ivar<type->GetStateVarsNumber();ivar++){
00061                 orderedvar=type->GetStateVarAt(ivar);
00062                 this->statevars[orderedvar+1]=type->TableAccess(type->GetStateVarAt(orderedvar), this->statevars);
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void Neuron::SynapsisEffect(Interconnection *inter){
00067         NeuronType *neutype;
00068         neutype=this->type;
00069         this->statevars[neutype->GetSynapticVarsAt(inter->GetType())+1]+=inter->GetWeight()*WEIGHTSCALE;
00070 }
00071 
00072 double Neuron::FiringEndPrediction(){
00073         NeuronType *type;
00074         double pred_time;
00075         type=this->type;
00076         pred_time=type->TableAccess(type->GetFiringEndTable(), this->statevars);
00077         return(pred_time);
00078 }
00079 
00080 double Neuron::FiringPrediction(){
00081         NeuronType *type;
00082         float pred_time;
00083         type=this->type;
00084         pred_time=type->TableAccess(type->GetFiringTable(), this->statevars);
00085         return(pred_time);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void Neuron::GenerateAutoActivity(EventQueue * eventQueue){
00089         Neuron postfiring=*this;
00090         postfiring.NeuronUpdate(this->GetPredictionEnd()-this->lastupdate);
00091         this->predictedspike = postfiring.FiringPrediction();
00092         if(this->predictedspike != NOPREDICTION){
00093                 this->predictedspike += this->predictionend;
00094                 InternalSpike * nextspike = new InternalSpike(this->predictedspike,this);
00095                 eventQueue->InsertEvent(nextspike);
00096         }       
00097 }
00098                 
00099 void Neuron::ProcessInputActivity(InternalSpike * InputSpike){
00100         this->NeuronUpdate(InputSpike->GetTime()-this->lastupdate); // could be removed
00101         this->lastupdate = InputSpike->GetTime();
00102         this->predictionend = this->FiringEndPrediction();
00103         
00104         if(this->predictionend != NOPREDICTION){
00105                 this->predictionend += InputSpike->GetTime();
00106         }else{
00107                 this->predictionend = InputSpike->GetTime()+DEF_REF_PERIOD;
00108                 cerr << "Warning: firing table and firing-end table discrepance (using default ref period)" << endl;
00109         }
00110 }
00111                 
00112 void Neuron::ProcessInputSynapticActivity(PropagatedSpike * InputSpike){
00113         Interconnection * inter = InputSpike->GetSource()->GetOutputConnectionAt(InputSpike->GetTarget());
00114         this->NeuronUpdate(InputSpike->GetTime()-this->lastupdate);
00115         this->SynapsisEffect(inter);
00116         this->lastupdate=InputSpike->GetTime();
00117 }
00118                 
00119 void Neuron::GenerateOutputActivity(Spike * InputSpike, EventQueue * eventQueue){
00120         if (this->IsOutputConnected()){
00121                 PropagatedSpike * spike = new PropagatedSpike(InputSpike->GetTime() + this->OutputConnections[0]->GetDelay(), this, 0);
00122                 eventQueue->InsertEvent(spike);
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 void Neuron::PropagateOutputSpike(PropagatedSpike * LastSpike, EventQueue * eventQueue){
00127         if(this->GetOutputNumber() > LastSpike->GetTarget()+1){
00128                 Interconnection * NewConnection = this->OutputConnections[LastSpike->GetTarget()+1]; 
00129                 PropagatedSpike * nextspike = new PropagatedSpike(LastSpike->GetTime()-this->OutputConnections[LastSpike->GetTarget()]->GetDelay()+NewConnection->GetDelay(),this,LastSpike->GetTarget()+1); 
00130                 eventQueue->InsertEvent(nextspike);
00131         }
00132 }
00133                 
00134 void Neuron::GenerateInputActivity(EventQueue * eventQueue){
00135         this->predictedspike = this->FiringPrediction();
00136         if(this->predictedspike != NOPREDICTION){
00137                 this->predictedspike += this->lastupdate;
00138                 if(this->predictedspike > this->predictionend){
00139                 InternalSpike * nextspike = new InternalSpike(this->predictedspike,this);
00140                 eventQueue->InsertEvent(nextspike);
00141                 }else{ // needed only for neurons which never stop firing
00142                         this->GenerateAutoActivity(eventQueue);
00143                 }
00144     }
00145 }
